# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a caption region.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a caption region

- **init(identifier:)**: Creates a caption region that has an identifier.

items.description: Creates a caption region that has an identifier.
items.name: init(identifier:)
